LanguageData.IncredibleSnowstorm.label: Incredible snowstorm
LanguageData.IncredibleSnowstorm.description: The wind reaches unprecedented speed. Movement is almost impossible. When shooting, you can hardly fall into anything.
LanguageData.HardFog.label: Thick fog
LanguageData.HardFog.description: Fog reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons.
LanguageData.Sandstorm.label: Sand storm
LanguageData.Sandstorm.description: Too much sand. I can not see anything!
